subtitle: This starter uses prawns, melon and grapefruit.

method.text: Cut both melons in half. Scoop out seeds and discard.
Using a melon bailer, scoop out balls of the melon flesh and place in a bowl.
Stir the grapefruit segments, celery and prawns in with the melon balls.
Whisk together the oil and wine vinegar. Pour over the cocktail and stir until well mixed.
Arrange a few lettuce leaves in the base of small serving bowls. Add the cocktail mixture.
Mix together the mayonnaise and lemon juice. Spoon a tablespoon of the mayonnaise on top of each cocktail. Sprinkle over a little extra freshly ground black pepper.

title: Florida prawn cocktail
